job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Javascript)
job.description: A high-growth Series D+ enterprise software client is seeking a <strong>Senior Software Engineer (Javascript) </strong>to build intuitive user experiences, explore better ways to visualize and organize new sources of data that will help take their analytics platform to the next level.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Design and develop the development of web applications to support stakeholders.</li><li>Collaborate with a team of developers to design end-to-end, industry-leading systems and solutions.</li><li>Rapidly prototype new ideas, concepts, and designs.</li><li>Research and develop new web and mobile technology applications to improve the user interface.</li><li>Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities.</li><li>Become familiar with APM concepts and existing user experiences and workflows.<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>Proven software development experience with strong JavaScript and React fundamentals.</li><li>Demonstrated experience writing performant and reusable components.</li><li>Deep familiarity with modern Javascript (ES6+), HTML, CSS/SASS.</li><li>Experience working within the constraints of a design framework, querying data from a variety of sources (GraphQL, REST APIs, and key/value datastore), reviewing PRs, and applying best practices to reviews.</li><li>Collaborative working style and excellent communication skills.<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>About Hire Digital<br><br></u></strong>Hire Digital helps enterprises and growth companies build and enhance their digital capabilities with a world-class network of digital marketers, developers, and designers. We have enabled companies like Philips, 3M, Roche, AXA, Unilever, and many more to reduce overheads and boost efficiency.<br><br>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>ScCUYhqxv7
